mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.meet_name, m.meet_type, ml.name as lecturer, ml.title as lecturer_title,ml.hospital as lecturer_hos, ml.headimg as lecturer_img, p.start_time, p.end_time, m.state,u.headimg, u.id as pub_user_id, f.id as `stored` FROM t_meet m LEFT JOIN t_meet_lecturer ml on m.id = ml.meet_id LEFT JOIN t_app_user u on m.owner_id = u.id LEFT JOIN t_meet_prop p on p.meet_id = m.id LEFT JOIN t_resource_favorite f on f.resource_id=m.id AND f.user_id=#{userId} WHERE m.state > 0 AND m.state < 4 AND m.tuijian = TRUE ORDER BY publish_time DESC

SELECT m.meet_type,d.icon, count(m.meet_type) as cnt FROM t_meet m LEFT JOIN t_app_attention a ON a.master_id=m.owner_id LEFT JOIN t_department d ON d.`name` = m.meet_type WHERE a.slaver_id=#{userId} AND m.state BETWEEN 1 AND 3 GROUP BY m.meet_type ORDER BY cnt DESC

SELECT m.id, m.meet_name,m.owner_id as pub_user_id, m.organizer, m.meet_type, m.introduction,m.state,p.start_time, p.end_time, ml.title as lecturer_title, ml.hospital as lecturer_hos, ml.depart as lecturer_depart,ml.headimg as lecturer_head,u.headimg, ml.name as lecturer, acd.img_url as cover_url, msx.prop_mode as requiredXs,msx.prop_value as xsCredits,msx.reward_limit as awardLimit, mse.prop_mode as rewardCredit,mse.prop_value as eduCredits,mse.reward_limit as awardCreditLimit FROM t_meet m LEFT JOIN t_meet_prop p on m.id = p.meet_id LEFT JOIN t_meet_setting msx on msx.meet_id = m.id and msx.prop_type = 1 LEFT JOIN t_meet_setting mse on mse.meet_id = m.id and mse.prop_type = 2 LEFT JOIN t_app_user u on u.id = m.owner_id LEFT JOIN t_meet_lecturer ml on ml.meet_id=m.id LEFT JOIN t_meet_audio ma on ma.meet_id = m.id AND ma.course_id > 0 LEFT JOIN t_audio_course_detail acd on acd.course_id=ma.course_id AND acd.sort=1 WHERE m.id = #{meetId} limit 1

SELECT m.id, m.meet_name, m.organizer, m.meet_type, m.introduction, ml.name as lecturer, p.start_time, p.end_time,m.state,u.headimg FROM t_meet m INNER JOIN t_meet_prop p on m.id = p.meet_id INNER JOIN t_app_user u on u.id = m.owner_id LEFT JOIN t_meet_lecturer ml on ml.id=m.lecturer_id WHERE m.state > 0 AND m.state < 4
AND (m.meet_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%'))

select m.id, m.meet_name,u.headimg, m.organizer, m.meet_type, m.state,mp.start_time, mp.end_time, msx.prop_mode as requiredXs, msx.prop_value as xs_credits,mse.prop_mode as rewardCredit,mse.prop_value as edu_credits, u.province,u.city,ml.`name` as lecturer,ml.headimg as lecturer_head, ml.title as lecturer_title, ml.hospital as lecturer_hos, ml.depart as lecturer_depart FROM t_meet m INNER JOIN t_resource_favorite f on m.id = f.resource_id AND f.user_id = #{userId} and f.resource_type = #{resourceType} INNER JOIN t_meet_prop mp on mp.meet_id = m.id INNER JOIN t_app_user u on u.id = m.owner_id LEFT JOIN t_meet_lecturer ml on ml.meet_id = m.id LEFT JOIN t_meet_setting msx on msx.meet_id = m.id and msx.prop_type = 1 LEFT JOIN t_meet_setting mse on mse.meet_id = m.id and mse.prop_type = 2

SELECT m.id, m.meet_name, m.state,m.create_time, m.publish_time, p.start_time FROM t_meet m LEFT JOIN t_meet_prop p on p.meet_id = m.id WHERE m.owner_id=#{masterId} AND m.state>0 GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.publish_time DESC
SELECT m.id, m.meet_name, m.state,m.create_time, m.publish_time FROM t_meet m WHERE m.owner_id=#{masterId} AND m.state>0 AND m.state < 3 GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.publish_time DESC
SELECT m.id, m.meet_name, m.state,m.create_time, m.publish_time FROM t_meet m WHERE m.owner_id=#{masterId} AND m.state=0 ORDER BY m.create_time DESC

SELECT tm.id AS meet_id,tm.meet_name,tm.publish_time, sum(th.usedtime) AS usedtime FROM t_meet tm LEFT JOIN t_audio_history th ON th.meet_id = tm.id WHERE tm.owner_id = #{ownerId} AND th.user_id = #{doctorId} GROUP BY tm.id ORDER BY tm.publish_time DESC
SELECT p.position_name from t_meet m LEFT JOIN t_meet_module md on m.id = md.meet_id LEFT JOIN t_meet_position p on m.id = p.meet_id where md.module_name='签到' and m.id=#{meetId}
mapper.update: update t_meet m set m.state = 2 where m.state = 1 and exists(select id from t_meet_prop where start_time < NOW() and end_time > NOW() and meet_id = m.id);
update t_meet m set m.state = 3 where m.state = 2 and exists(select id from t_meet_prop where end_time < NOW() and meet_id = m.id);
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM t_meet_setting WHERE meet_id = #{meetId}
AND propMode = #{propMode}

select m.id, m.meet_name,u.headimg, m.organizer, m.meet_type, ml.`name` as lecturer, ml.headimg as lecturer_head, ml.title as lecturer_title, ml.hospital as lecturer_hos, ml.depart as lecturer_depart, mp.start_time, mp.end_time, m.state, msx.prop_value as xs_credits, mse.prop_value as edu_credits from t_meet m INNER JOIN t_resource_favorite f on m.id = f.resource_id and f.resource_type = 0 AND f.user_id = #{userId} INNER JOIN t_meet_prop mp on mp.meet_id = m.id INNER JOIN t_app_user u on u.id = m.owner_id LEFT JOIN t_meet_lecturer ml on ml.meet_id = m.id LEFT JOIN t_meet_setting msx on msx.meet_id = m.id and msx.prop_type = 1 LEFT JOIN t_meet_setting mse on mse.meet_id = m.id and mse.prop_type = 2 ORDER BY f.store_time DESC
SELECT vmf.* FROM t_recommend r INNER JOIN v_meet_folder_final vmf on vmf.id = r.resource_id WHERE r.fixed = true limit 1

SELECT * FROM v_meet_folder_final WHERE type=0 and meet_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%') UNION SELECT * FROM v_meet_folder_final WHERE state BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND type=1 and meet_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%')
SELECT * FROM v_meet_folder_final WHERE id = #{id}
